topic: The Container must resemble the Content

analysis.input_vector: System detected rigidity in the UI borders. Logic is fluid; container was static.
analysis.output_vector: Refactored layout containers to behave as 'Biomimetic Membranes'. Implemented idle-state heartbeats.
analysis.key_insight: A living system is not a box; it is a cell. The border is defined by the internal pressure (Entropy).

crystallization_result.axiom_injected: Membrane Theory: The interface expands and contracts with the breath of the logic.
crystallization_result.action: UI Borders upgraded to Energy Fields.
